```{r}
library(openxlsx)
library(roahd)
nrg_balances=read.xlsx('complete_energy_balances.xlsx',sheet=4)
View(nrg_balances)
```

```{r}
nrg_balances=nrg_balances[7:50,]    #quit useless rows
colnames(nrg_balances)=nrg_balances[1,] #use years as columns names
nrg_balances=nrg_balances[-1,] #first row now is useless
rownames(nrg_balances)=nrg_balances[,1] #use countries as row names
nrg_balances=nrg_balances[,-1] #first colum is now useless

```

Let's quit empty values, signaled with the caharacter ":"
```{r}
nrg_balances=nrg_balances[!nrg_balances[,1]==':',]
```

A first plot of total energy consumption
```{r}
matplot(colnames(nrg_balances),t(nrg_balances[4:38,]),type='l',xlab="Year",ylab="Thousand tonnes of oil equivalent")
```
